summary: A documentary that focuses on a group of young athletes in southern Louisiana as they work toward achieving their goals of becoming professional mixed martial arts fighters.
cast: 'Bad' Chad Broussard|Jere' Folley Chaisson|'Crazy' Tim Credeur|Derek Gauthier|Gil 'The Thrill' Guillory|Lori Guillory|Corey Judice|Derrick Krantz|Ronny Lis|Dustin Poirier|Paul Soileau|Albert Stainback
keywords: fight|mixed martial arts|title fight|busboy|reference to friedrich nietzsche
title: Fightville
